Name: Limoncello Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: If you like the liqueur, you'll love the cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Francesco at Mix, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Limoncello Martini contains 121 calories
